entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Rain or periods of snow beginning before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow in the morning and with periods of drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
